body_html:
Update: -I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/gemmlowp \ should be added to INCLUDES (around line 130) instead of HOST_INCLUDES. Also the path to gtest also needs to be added to INCLUDES:

-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/gemmlowp \
-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/protobuf/gmock/gtest/include \

That fixed my compiler error. Now I'm having some linker error..

body:
Update: `-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/gemmlowp \` should be added to INCLUDES (around line 130) instead of HOST_INCLUDES. Also the path to gtest also needs to be added to INCLUDES:

```
-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/gemmlowp \
-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/protobuf/gmock/gtest/include \
```

That fixed my compiler error. Now I'm having some linker error..
